participant_1.background:
I have three very close roommates, but I don't see my family often.
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
I am not close with my family, but I love my dog Bob.
I'm always up for going to a movie with my new love.
I prefer not to have pets since my home is my sanctuary and I need it to be a quiet place.

participant_2.background:
I've seen a blue whale while on a boat tour in Alaska.
I am clumsy, I often trip over my own feet and bump into things.
I rent an apartment near my favorite sushi bar.
everyday i go swimming at the y.
i m a pilot for southwest.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
Hi there! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing great! Thanks for asking. I'm a juggler for a living and I love it. What do you do for a living?
I'm a pilot for Southwest Airlines. I love it too! I get to see the world and meet new people all the time.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go on a boat tour in Alaska. Have you ever seen a blue whale?
Yes, I have! I saw a blue whale while on a boat tour in Alaska. It was amazing!
That's so cool! I've always wanted to see a blue whale. I'm not very close with my family, but I love my dog Bob.
I'm a little clumsy. I often trip over my own feet and bump into things. I rent an apartment near my favorite sushi bar. Every day I go swimming at the Y.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm always up for going to a movie with my new love. I prefer not to have pets since my home is my sanctuary and I need it to be a quiet place.
That's good to hear! I'm always up for going to a movie with my friends. I love going swimming at the Y too. I'm not very close with my family, but I love my dog Bob.
That sounds great! I'm glad to hear that you're enjoying your life.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear that you're enjoying your life too.
